description: Creates and persists a DataIntegration resource.

parameters.name: KmsKey
parameters.description: The KMS key ARN for the DataIntegration.

parameters.name: ScheduleConfig
parameters.description: The name of the data and how often it should be pulled from the source. FirstExecutionFrom (string) --- The start date for objects to import in the first flow run as an Unix/epoch timestamp in milliseconds or in ISO-8601 format. Object (string) --- The name of the object to pull from the data source. How often the data should be pulled from data source.

nested_params.name: FirstExecutionFrom
nested_params.description: The start date for objects to import in the first flow run as an Unix/epoch timestamp in milliseconds or in ISO-8601 format.

nested_params.name: Object
nested_params.description: The name of the object to pull from the data source.

nested_params.name: ScheduleExpression
nested_params.description: How often the data should be pulled from data source.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource. For example, { 'tags': {'key1':'value1', 'key2':'value2'} }. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: FileConfiguration
parameters.description: The configuration for what files should be pulled from the source. Identifiers for the source folders to pull all files from recursively. (string) --- Filters (dict) --- Restrictions for what files should be pulled from the source. (string) --- (list) --- (string) ---

nested_params.name: Folders
nested_params.description: Identifiers for the source folders to pull all files from recursively.

nested_params.name: Filters
nested_params.description: Restrictions for what files should be pulled from the source.

parameters.name: ObjectConfiguration
parameters.description: The configuration for what data should be pulled from the source. (string) --- (dict) --- (string) --- (list) --- (string) ---
